description:
Danny touches on the new series, The Real Housewives Ultimate Girls Trip. Then he welcomes one of the first loves of his life, Devon Sawa. Devon starred in such movies as Casper, Now & Then, Little Giants, Final Destination, and more. He can currently be seen in the Chucky TV series, and the movie Black Friday! Danny then chats with Mark Long, OG Road Rules star and producer of The Challenge All Stars, now streaming on Paramount+!


Devon Sawa: 5:00ish

Mark Long: 35:42ish


PREORDER DANNY'S NEW BOOK HERE: http://smarturl.it/unremember


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
